mapper.sql: id, name, code, contacts, phone, address, status, create_user, create_time, remarks
mapper.select:
select t.id, t.name, t.code, t.contacts, t.phone, t.address, t.status, t.create_user, t.create_time, t.remarks from warehouse t where 1 = 1
and t.name like concat('%',#{form.name},'%')
and t.code like concat('%',#{form.code},'%')
and t.create_user like concat('%',#{form.createUser},'%')
and t.create_time >= concat(date_format(#{form.createTime}, '%Y-%m-%d'), ' 00:00:00') and t.create_time <= concat(date_format(#{form.createTime}, '%Y-%m-%d'), ' 23:59:59');
